public interface EngineerService extends AccountService<Engineer>

Interface EngineerService

This is a Engineer specific service. It extends AccountService

  • Method Details

    • getAssignedComplaint

      Complaint getAssignedComplaint(String email, String password, int complaintId) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Returns a complaint with the given id that has been assigned to the given employee. All the FetchType.LAZY fields are set to null.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      Returns:
      The Complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee is not found or the complaint with the given id is not associated with the employee.
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized.

    • getAllAssignedComplaints

      List<Complaint> getAllAssignedComplaints(String email, String password) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Returns a list of complaints that has been assigned to the given employee. All the FetchType.LAZY fields are set to null.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      Returns:
      The a List of Complaint
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the employee is not found.
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized.

    • changeComplaintStatus

      void changeComplaintStatus(String email, String password, int complaintId, String status) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Changes the status of a complaint.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      status - The new status of the complaint.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized.
      NotFoundException - If the employee, complaint or status is not found. Or, if the complaint is not associated with the employee

    • addUpdateToComplaint

      void addUpdateToComplaint(String email, String password, int complaintId, String update) throws AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException, NotFoundException
      Adds an update to a complaint.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      password - The password of the employee. Throws IllegalArgumentException it is null.
      complaintId - The id of the complaint.
      update - The new update of the complaint.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - If the employee is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the employee is not authorized.
      NotFoundException - If the employee or complaint is not found. Or, if the complaint is not associated with the employee
